serviceCategories.name: Digital Transformation
serviceCategories.description: Transform your business with cutting-edge digital solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and innovation.
serviceCategories.overview: Digital transformation is more than just adopting new technology—it's about fundamentally changing how your business operates and delivers value to customers. Our comprehensive approach helps organizations reimagine their processes, culture, and customer experiences through strategic digital initiatives.

services.name: Discovery & Strategy
services.description: Comprehensive analysis and strategic planning to identify digital transformation opportunities and create actionable roadmaps.
services.detailedDescription: Our Discovery & Strategy service is the foundation of successful digital transformation. We conduct thorough assessments of your current technology landscape, business processes, and organizational capabilities to identify transformation opportunities that deliver maximum value.

process.title: Business Assessment
process.description: Comprehensive evaluation of current processes, technology, and capabilities

process.title: Opportunity Identification
process.description: Identify high-value transformation opportunities aligned with business goals

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Create detailed digital transformation strategy and roadmap

process.title: Implementation Planning
process.description: Develop actionable implementation plan with timelines and milestones

services.name: Foundation Setup
services.description: Establish robust technological foundations and infrastructure to support your digital transformation journey.
services.detailedDescription: Foundation Setup ensures your organization has the technological infrastructure and capabilities needed for successful digital transformation. We focus on creating scalable, secure, and flexible foundations that can grow with your business.

process.title: Infrastructure Assessment
process.description: Evaluate current infrastructure and identify requirements

process.title: Architecture Design
process.description: Design scalable and secure technology architecture

process.title: Implementation

process.title: Testing & Optimization

serviceCategories.name: AI & Machine Learning
serviceCategories.description: Harness the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to automate processes, gain insights, and drive innovation.
serviceCategories.overview: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning are transforming industries by enabling intelligent automation, predictive analytics, and enhanced decision-making. Our AI/ML solutions help businesses unlock the value of their data and create competitive advantages through intelligent systems.

services.description: Custom machine learning models designed to solve specific business problems and drive intelligent automation.
services.detailedDescription: Our Machine Learning Models service focuses on developing custom ML solutions that address your specific business challenges. From predictive analytics to classification systems, we build models that learn from your data and improve over time.

services.detailedDescription: Natural Language Processing enables computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language. Our NLP solutions help businesses extract insights from text data, automate customer interactions, and improve communication.
